data.expected_result: There should only be one invite because the owner of the 1st invite left
data.short_description: Can make 2 working invites to a group dm even if the owner of the original one leaves
data.steps_to_repro: - have owner paste group dm invite into group chat - make them leave - have new owner add them back via the "Add friends to group dm" modal - Have new owner check the Instant Invites section of the group dm
